conversation_summary: A conversation introducing oneself to someone named Maria.

conversation.speaker: person1
conversation.message: ¿Qué te gusta hacer en tu tiempo libre ?

conversation.speaker: person2
conversation.message: Me gusta leer libros y ver películas.

conversation.speaker: person1
conversation.message: Yo también. ¿Has leído algo interesante recientemente ?

conversation_summary: A conversation about hobbies and interests, including reading books and watching movies.

conversation.speaker: person1
conversation.message: No, no soy muy fanático de la playa.

conversation_summary: A conversation about going to the beach, whether or not someone likes it.

conversation.speaker: person2
conversation.message: Me gusta la comida italiana, especialmente la pizza.

conversation.speaker: person1
conversation.message: Yo también. ¿Has probado la pizza de mi país ?

conversation_summary: A conversation about favorite types of food, including Italian food and pizza.

conversation.speaker: person2
conversation.message: Sí, me encanta. ¿Has viajado alguna vez a un país extranjero ?

conversation.speaker: person1
conversation.message: No, aún no. Pero quiero visitar España pronto.

conversation_summary: A conversation about traveling and visiting foreign countries, including wanting to visit Spain in the future.
